channel.title: V2.3b: Mini Security Patch
channel.description:
*Taking a step back from v2.4 --*
Now that Mac/Linux has been sunset (Apologies folks ðŸ˜¢ but it allowed this hotfix to happen):
We had some annoying hacker games, lately: This was introduced by a vulnerability caused by our 3rd-party server. Luckily, they worked hard to deliver us a quick patch :smiley: while we can't stop all hacks, we'll try our best to secure them where we can.
> v2.3.0b (LIVE)
1. Vulnerability fixes. 2. More vulnerability fixes. 3. Removed Streamer Mode (this was broken for so long). 4. Support for Halloween (Moon Festival) **part 1** event - new Halloween/Anniversary (II) items can come next patch for pt2. 5. Now using Unity 2019 (from 2018) 6. Support for the new experimental Garbage Collection system with Unity 2019: Fast+Efficient.
> Requirements
Windows (64-bit) Only
> New Runtime Requirement
[Visual C++ Redist 2012](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=30679#)
^ Most should already have this. I also asked Steam to include this now. If you get stuck @ login, try this link manually. And no, I don't use VS2012 :P 3rd-party lib.
> Possible Bugs * We're testing a downgraded version of our text engine to avoid the Unity 2019 bug we saw on the v2.4 test realm: Hopefully this goes away. The Unity dev for this is working on a fix as we speak, but I'm impatient :)
_________
That's it!
Coming soon to #test-realm [in Discord!](https://discord.gg/tol)
**We'll get [back to v2.4](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/v2-4-beta-patch-notes/78603) shortly after.**
